answer: The structural analysis of meson loop corrections in HBChPT can be used in future research to determine significant parts of the loop corrections, utilizing the three-flavor-index representation of the effective baryon fields (hep-ph/0104197).
explanation: This paper provides a detailed analysis of the structure of meson loop corrections in HBChPT, which can be generalized to other problems in HBChPT.
evidence_quote: The structural analysis can be generalized straightforwardly to other problems in HBChPT
